field.name: text_mainid
field.label: Unique ID*
field.description: Type in a unique id for multiple use on one page

field.name: owl_cssjs
field.label: Remove OWL CSS/JS
field.description: Select this if you want to prevent loading maintheme and js twice - for example if you use multiple rotators on one site - leave at least one to - No -

field.name: owl_responsive
field.label: Responsive
field.description: Set to - No - if you don´t want a responsive behaviour

field.name: titlecolor
field.label: Title Color
field.description: Set the Color of the Title - for example #000

field.name: corners
field.label: Display Corners
field.description: display special corners arround the rotator

field.name: slidespeed
field.label: Slide speed in ms
field.description: Set the slide speed here as integer in ms

field.name: paginationspeed
field.label: Pagination Speed
field.description: Set the pagination speed here as integer in ms

field.name: rewindSpeed
field.label: Rewind Speed
field.description: Set the rewind speed here as integer in ms

field.name: owl_stophover
field.label: Stop on Hover
field.description: If you want, to stop the rotator on hove set Yes

field.name: owl_scrollpage
field.label: Scroll Page
field.description: Scroll per page not per item. This affect next/prev buttons and mouse/touch dragging.

field.name: lazyload
field.label: Lazy Load Images
field.description: Delays loading of images. Images outside of viewport wont be loaded before user scrolls to them.

field.name: owl_itemsscaleup
field.label: Skale up
field.description: Scales the images to fit in full width

field.name: owl_navigation
field.label: Navigation
field.description: Select if you want the show the Navigation

field.name: nav_prev
field.label: Previous Nav Text
field.description: You can use html if you want

field.name: nav_next
field.label: Next Nav Text
field.description: You can use html if you want

field.name: owl_pagination
field.label: Display Pagination
field.description: Display pagination dots below the rotator

field.name: owl_paginationnumber
field.label: Display Numbers
field.description: Display Slidenumber inside of the pagination
